tool_description: it can analyse photos of food and/or its ingredients and provide nutrirional content and other insights. It can also analyse the growth of plants!
name: Food and plants specialist
title: Food and plants specialist

api_list.name: plant-identifier-text
api_list.description: Given the name of a plant of any part of a plant, it gives you the same information as plant-identifier. For output reference, please see plant-identifier
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://food-and-plants-specialist.p.rapidapi.com/plant-identifier-text/tomato"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "food-and-plants-specialist.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://food-and-plants-specialist.p.rapidapi.com/plant-identifier-text/{plant}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "food-and-plants-specialist.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: dish-identifier-text
api_list.description: Given the name of a dish provided as a variable of a get request, it outputs same information as dish-identifier. For output reference, please see dish-identifier
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://food-and-plants-specialist.p.rapidapi.com/dish-identifier-text/chicken"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "food-and-plants-specialist.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

import requests

url = "https://food-and-plants-specialist.p.rapidapi.com/dish-identifier-text/{dish}"

            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
